version_description: You can now search and share products directly from iMessage.

• ShopRunner is now live on the Saks App. Log into ShopRunner via the account page or any product detail page and start shopping!
• Universal Links - directly open the Saks App and shop designers from all of our emails.
• Bug fixes, performance improvements and more.

• SaksFirst - you can now view points and pay your bill all from within the Saks App.
• Bug fixes, performance improvements and more.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Gift Cards are now available! Just in time for the holiday season.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes & performance improvements.

- Introducing Message Center - get alerts for your favorite designer sales, SaksFirst exclusives and more.
- Bug fixes & performance improvements.
Bug fixes & performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Introducing Apple Pay. Now buying the designers you love is a little bit easier.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
While we hope you enjoy everything you purchase, now you can easily start returns from your account at anytime.
Bug fixes & performance improvements.
Scan your favorite products in-store and add them to your favorites. Improvements throughout the app to help you find products by your favorite designers.
Bug fix for ShopRunner crash and other performance improvements.
This includes bugs fixes and other performance improvements.
This includes bugs fixes and other performance improvements.
Bug fixes and UI improvements.
Includes several bug fixes and performance improvements to make the experience better for our customers.
We added the ability to match with a dedicated Saks Style Advisor for personalized recommendations nationwide.
Ability to redeem SaksFirst loyalty points in checkout, and find services at your local Saks store.

There are a few enhancements we included with this release:
- You can now book beauty, bridal salon, etc appointments at your local Saks Store.
- We have also included the ability to scan a barcode while in store from search on your iPad to pull up product details.
- You can shop similar items and recently viewed products throughout the mobile app.
You can now checkout in the the App using PayPal.
We added the ability to match with a dedicated Saks Style Advisor for personalized recommendations nationwide.
Bug fixes and user experience improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

We have improved our loyalty program communication as well as our customer service feedback form in this version.  It also includes several bug fixes and performance improvements to make the experience better for our customers.

-Discover styles and collections tailored to how you shop—starting with two separate women's and men's homepages.
-Get insider access to the latest trends and fashion inspiration on The Edit—from tutorials and how-tos to exclusive interviews.
-Find exactly what you're looking for in seconds with optimized navigation, customized filters and sorting, predictive search terms and featured results.
-Buy Online, Pick Up in Store: If an item's available at your local Saks, you can purchase it online and pick it up at the store later that day.
